title: Riot I'm over 1000 please play :)
body: Is there any rioter that would like to play with me i reached over 1000 wins :D please

replies.body: Well i want to hear it from a rioter not a random that i don't know if they are joking or saying the truth :). That way when i reach 1999 i know to say it then.
I'm just joking. I'm sure there are a few Rioters who would be keen for a game.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=MjbEwaP3,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-07-13T08:15:05.945+0000)
>
> I'm just joking. I'm sure there are a few Rioters who would be keen for a game.

LOL
Riot sephyre "Add me in game!"  hype
Gotta be quicker next time lol

Hey Man,

Spawn here - I am one of the shoutcasters. Add me in game and I am happy too.

Cheers,
You should add him on Skype and shoutcast that game too ^^
we got our game through ranked soloq! not even queueing together. will see how we go
Well good sir you have your wish!
yeah...should have notified them a little earlier.
